summary: This bill, H.R. 5589, aims to rename the Department of Veterans Affairs clinic in Riverhead, New York, as the "Private First Class Garfield M. Langhorn VA Clinic." The bill includes findings detailing the heroic actions of Private First Class Langhorn, who sacrificed his life to save his comrades during the Vietnam War. The bill mandates the renaming and directs that all references to the clinic use the new designation.
